### Normalizácia

```{r}
# upvote ratio, moze byt negativne???
x <- sapply(df$upvote_ratio,customLogTransform)
hist(x)
boxplot(x)
```
```{r}
# score, 	Outlier (-Inf) in boxplot 1 is not drawn
customLogTransform <- function(x){
  if (x > 0){
    log(x)
  }
  else if (x < 0)
    log(abs(x)) * -1
  else 
    0
}
x <- sapply(df$score,customLogTransform)
hist(x)
boxplot(x)
```
